<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/admin/rebuild-search-index"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Rebuild the tenant search index from the data stored in the database
and in storage

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"x-tenant-id","in":"header","description":"ID of the tenant you are targeting","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"x-tenant-env","in":"header","description":"Environment of the tenant you are targeting","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
